title: Helen Duff
itunes:title: Helen Duff
itunes:subtitle: This week I’m talking to comedian + podcaster Helen Duff about her Grandma, who died suddenly last year in a traffic accident.
description:
This week I’m talking to comedian + podcaster Helen Duff about her Grandma, who died suddenly last year in a traffic accident.

As ever we talk grief, shock + pregnancy whilst managing both those emotions


You can follow Helen on Twitter @duffmarvel and you can follow Griefcast on Twitter and Instagram @TheGriefcast


Griefcast is hosted by Cariad Lloyd, edited by Kate Holland, recorded at Whistledown Studios (or Cariad's living room in lockdown), artwork is by Jayde Perkin and the music is provided by The Glue Ensemble. And remember, you are not alone.


Rose D'or Nominee 2019, Podcast of the Year 2018, Best Podcast ARIA's 2018.

"the pandemic's most important podcast" Telegraph



Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
